data.title: Request portuguese nationality
data.text:
The information about the service Request Portuguese Nationality is being revised due to the publication of the latest changes to the Portuguese Nationality Regulation.

See the updated information about the Nationality Law in the news "Amendments to the Nationality Law enter into force on April 15th" published in ePortugal.

Online:

The application for nationality online service can only be done through a lawyer or solicitor.

The lawyer or solicitor must access NacionalidadeOnline and authenticate themselves with their digital certificate and have an active digital signature.

At the counter:

The application for Portuguese nationality is made in person, in one of the following places:

at the counter of the Institute of Registration and Notary Affairs at the National Support Centre for the Integration of Migrants (CNAIM) in Lisbon or Oporto

at the Registry Spaces in Lisbon, on Avenida Fontes Pereira de Melo, on the Campus da Justiça and in Benfica

at the Central Registry Office in Lisbon

at the Nationality Desk

at the Odivelas Citizens' Shop

at the Civil Registry Offices

at the Portuguese Consulate in your area of residence.

Go to one of the locations indicated and apply for Portuguese Nationality. Deliver the requested documents.

By mail:

The application for nationality can be made by mail and the form to be filled in depends on the particular situation. After filling in the form, you must send the application to the Conservatória dos Registos Centrais, Rua Rodrigo da Fonseca, 202, 1099-033 Lisbon.
